---
title: "CCMI Online Open Day"
author: "Timo Betcke"
event_date: "11/10/2025"
date: "10/07/2025"
summary: "We are organising an online open day to get to know the CDT, our research and how the application process works."
categories: [News]
---

On 10 November, there will be a virtual open day from 2pm to 4pm GMT. At this event, you will have an opportunity to hear
from and meet the CDT team, researchers who will be supervising some students, and the current CDT students.

If you want to take part please fill out our [CDT registration form](https://forms.cloud.microsoft/e/twBdtrGwkE). No need to fill it out again
if you have already registered your interest in the CDT.

We will send out online joining links to registered participants before the event.

We are looking forward to meeting you!
